name: open-signal-index
description: Prototype for Open Signal Index dashboard and ingestion stack.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w web" "npm run dev -w api"
scripts.build: npm run build -w web && npm run deploy -w api
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npm run publish -w api && npm run deploy -w web && vercel --prod
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w api && npm run lint -w web
scripts.format: npm run format -w api && npm run format -w web
